original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Several areas in Moneragala experienced a minor tremor on Friday (21) morning.
The Geological Survey and Mines Bureau told News 1st that the tremor was experienced at around 9:06 AM and was recorded as a magnitude 2.6 tremor.
It added that the tremor was recorded across all seismic stations in the country.
It went on to note that the tremor was felt at the Moneragala District Secretariat as well.
Special Gazette notification declaring public and bank holidays in 2024
